column4: (et.al):  if it's any consolation, many folks have grown weary with getting pulseaudio to work and have lapsed back to alsa (or whatever)
: i have seen that when ive searched the problem. thanx. my sound card is Intel, that seems to be consistent.
: no input devices found...sends to dummy output
a wild notion:  you've killed all pulseaudio daemons and/or rebooted?
